response.original_title: Goal III: Taking on the World
response.overview: Mexican footballer Santiago Muñez, along with his best friends and England national team players Charlie Braithwaite and Liam Adams, are selected for their respective national teams at the 2006 FIFA World Cup Finals in Germany.
response.title: Goal III: Taking on the World
